schedule_time.description: Start time for the schedule period (HH:MM). Value = Minute * 256 + Hour.

schedule_hour_1st_fine.description: Ignored if not explicitly set to a value.

schedule_hour_2nd_fine.description: Ignored if not explicitly set to a value.

schedule_hour_3rd_fine.description: Ignored if not explicitly set to a value.

schedule_hour_4th_fine.description: Ignored if not explicitly set to a value.

schedule_minute_fine.description: Ignored if not explicitly set to a value.
